Napoleonville meetingNonPrivilegedpst When Tuesday August AM AM GMT Central Time US Canada Where EB

FW Survey letterOriginal Message From mailto Sent Friday November AM To Rainer Eva Cc Subject Survey letter Eva The attached letter requests LRCIs approval on a surveyor I am also faxing a signed copy to Please sign and return to me at Thank you John Florence See attached file LRCI Survey Letter doc

Napoleonville ItemsGerald There are a number of things that have come up on which I hope to get your assistance concerning both Dow wells and and the land sale to Texas Brine Starting with Dow I have written a very rough draft reply to Gary Chapmans letter of October regarding a new amendment to the Brine Services Agreement We still would like them to buy the pad gas but given the equipment purchases needed if we do have to remove the pad gas we have to have a concrete deadline for whether they will buy the gas Dec Even so in talking to Dave Owen it seems to me that the equipment may not be installed for rebrining by the time we exit the wells How do we handle that type of delay contractually Dave Owen has told Dow that we are not interested in allowing the fresh water option that Dow suggested in their letter so I did not even address it here I think they understand that we want no part of that Perhaps we can discuss these and other issues after youve read the draft As for the Texas Brine land sale Jean has asked me to draw up a timeline to close I have spoken to the Texas Brine folks and unless something goes really wrong with their environmental analysis we all expect this to close by the end of November The timeline reflects this but I would like you to take a quick look and see if I am missing anything as there really are not that many steps TB has not gotten back to us on the draft sale document but Im hoping to get it soon There has been a bit of delay as they have requested access to any environmental assessments we have done on the land All the channels I have pursued tell me there has never been anything done by Enron per Kyle Purvis If you know anything about this please let me know Do you have a draft of the easement agreement for the March land sale I dont have alot of details about location etc but I think I could find them out if necessary Perhaps while we are waiting for a reply on the sale doc we can hammer out the language for the easements on that and on the new land sale I think thats it for now have a great weekend and please let me know if you have time to talk early next week Thanks Eva

FW TBC Pipeline RightofWay AgreementOriginal Message From Wayne Sneed mailto Sent Thursday November PM To Rainer Eva Subject TBC Pipeline RightofWay Agreement Eva Here is the pipeline rightofway agreement that we have been talking about I just received it I havent even read it yet but it at least gives us something to work with Call me after you have had a chance to digest it Lets keep this thing moving Forwarded by Wayne SneedUNITED on PM Ollie Easter on PM To cc Subject TBC Pipeline RightofWay Agreement Please see attached Agreement This communication may be protected by the attorneyclient privilege and may contain confidential information intended only for the person to whom it is addressed Any views or opinions expressed are solely those of the author and do not necessarily represent those of Chamberlain Hrdlicka White Williams and Martin Any use dissemination forwarding printing or copying of this email without consent of the originator is strictly prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify Ollie M Easter by telephone at See attached file v Texas Brine Pipeline Right of Way Agreementdoc

FW Louisiana Cash SaleI guess this means he was out of the office today Original Message From Marjorie Pribyl mailto Sent Friday November PM To Rainer Eva Cc Wayne Sneed Subject Louisiana Cash Sale Dear Eva Attached is an edited copy of the Louisiana Cash Sale as you had discussed with Mr Sneed See attached file Louisiana Cash Sale Form Napoleonvilledoc If after review you have any questions please advise Mr Sneed shoud be in the office some on Monday November Mrs Marjorie J Pribyl Executive Secretary Texas United Corporation San Felipe Houston Texas Phone Fax

FW Louisiana property purchase closingOriginal Message From Wayne Sneed mailto Sent Monday November PM To Rainer Eva Cc Ted Grabowski Subject Louisiana property purchase closing Eva Please have your attorney or yourself contact Jim Spring our attorney with any comments regarding the documents you have been provided If he is unavailable you are always welcome to call me Jims email address is above His phone number is We would like to target a closing on Monday November at pm Call me if you have any questions Wayne

Napoleonville land sale Cc Ana Per our conversation earlier today Our survey shows the tracts we are selling consist of acres For the purpose of the DASH we need to have a precise book value for those acres so I need to confirm with you one final time the book value for that land Also the draft agreement for the land sale stipulates that all ad valorem taxes bearing against the property due and payable through have been paid Before we sign the agreement we need confirmation from you that this is the case Since we are trying to close this deal tomorrow I would appreciate a quick response Thanks for your cooperation Eva
Revised Act of Sale Cc Ken Here is the latest version Please have a look and forward back with comments Thanks Eva

Texas Brine Documents Cc Document Signature Cash Sale Form Jean MrhaJulie Gomez Easements Agreement Jean MrhaJulie Gomez if needed DASH Rick BuyDave Gorte Jean MrhaJulie Gomez Mark Haedicke John LavoratoLouise Kitchen Jeff McMahonRay Bowen The DASH may need a legal risk rating attachment and Gerald can draft that quickly if needed I hope it wont be needed though given that there is really nothing at risk Also Dave Gorte may need to adjust it when he sees the DASH so I would begin by emailing a copy to him Here they are

Reliant Documents Cc Document Signature Act of Sale Form Jean MrhaJulie Gomez Board Resolution Mark Haedicke Louise Kitchen Corporate Guaranty Jeff McMahonRay Bowen DONE for MM Certificate of NonForeign Status Stephen Douglas DONE DASH Rick BuyDave Gorte Jean MrhaJulie Gomez Mark Haedicke John LavoratoLouise Kitchen Jeff McMahonRay Bowen This DASH definitely needs a Legal Risk memo which I have attached as a separate document Along with the DASH it needs to be updated for the actual sale price and the date was wrongI fixed that on the attached but be sure Geralds version has the right date and then added on to the body of the DASH before signatures Gorte has already looked at this one so we should be okay to get going on the signatures right away though I would still start with him just in case There must be a computer glitch because I am not able to open the Act of Sale and Board Resolution documents that Gerald forwarded He will of course provide executable copies of those documents anyway same goes for the TB documents but I will forward you his email and hopefully you will have better luck opening them than I did The DASH anf the Lega Risk Memo are attached below and I will leave copies of the Certificate of NonForeign Status on your desk

Napoleonville land sale Cc Lisa Here is the deal as it stands with each counterparty Texas Brine Wayne SneedTreasurer the main contact his number is Ted GrabowskiPresident and CEO Sale AgreementThe Cash Sale Form is drafted no changes needed Gerald can get executable copies ready right away Easements AgreementWe would like to delay execution if possible but Gerald can have executables in place fairly quickly if they insist DASHwritten requires signatures beginning with Dave Gorte I will call Wayne in the morning and tell him to remain on standy Well know fairly quickly where we are when Reliant calls us tomorrow morning around and I can tell him before my flight leaves If the Reliant deal is off we can start moving right away on this Ill tell him to be in touch with you regarding document delivery and cash transfer Reliant Ken BradleyVP Energy Wholesale Group main contact his office number is He tends to be easier to reach on his cell Sale AgreementThe Act of Sale is drafted and just needs to have the new pricing put in at which point we can get executables and signature Board ResolutionDrafted and submitted to Reliant we expect they will not have issues with it and we can get executables on what we have Corporate GuarantyHas been executed for MM Gerald has the original For ease of execution we will try to get Reliant to accept it at MM even with a higher sale price but if pressed we will have to get another one signed for the amount of the sale I believe Clement Abrams will take care of that but check with Gerald Certificate of NonForeign StatusSigned by Stephen Douglas I have left you the original for Reliant I assume and copies for us DASHwritten but will require ran update for new pricing Need to show Gorte one last time get his signature and then it needs the rest of the signatures Ken will be calling us back around tomorrow immediately after his meeting with whomever can authorize a higher price he has all our numbers so if he cant reach me he will call Jean directly in Buffalo If we get a suitable price MM or higher then the next step is to get them comfortable with the guaranty we have executed then get the DASH signed and move on from there In my previous email I told him you would be involved so Ill put him in touch with you as soon as we have a deal The wiring instructions for either party are as follows Account name ECT Cash Services Acc Entity Bank Name Citibank New York Account Number Routing Number Reliant already has these instructions Either party may want to cut a check instead it just becomes a question of which is faster and easier I will forward you the latest copies of all the documents for each party as separate emails As far as signatures are concerned Julie Gomez told me she would be in on Wednesday and availabe to sign but Jean may want to handle it via fax That can be decided tomorrow I will list out the rest of the needed signatures in the respective emails Well try as I may Im sure there are issues I have not covered so feel free to call me at any point at the phone numbers I sent earlier Good luck and THANKS for helping us out Eva

FW Cash Sale Napoleonville Texas BrineNonPrivilegedpst Aha Sorry I didnt remember sooner that Taffy sent it to me electronically Anyway this should make things much easier Please let me know if you need anything else Ill keep you posted on the bids By the way does Enron have a preferred form of payment Oxy wanted to know if we wanted cash or check Isnt a wire transfer what we usually do Original Message From Milligan Taffy Sent Monday June PM To Rainer Eva Cc White Ann Elizabeth Subject Cash Sale Napoleonville Texas Brine Per your request Taffy Milligan Sr Admin Assistant EWSLegal Tele Fax

Napoleonville land saleNonPrivilegedpst Gary Per our conversation on July I would like to reiterate that an Enron entity is interested in selling approximately acres of land at the Napoleonville salt dome in Louisiana This land is divided into two tracts one of about acres and the other about acres in size Enron recently received per acre in a separate land transaction at Napoleonville and this sets the market price that we expect to receive in the above proposed land sale Does Dow have interest in this land Is this price within your range If so I would encourage you to draft a proposal from Dow within the next two weeks if possible This email does not constitute an offer but is solely provided for informational purposes Lets discuss this at your earliest convenience Thanks again for taking the time to meet with me last Thursday and I look forward to hearing from you soon Sincerely Eva Rainer Upstream Products Group Enron Americas

RE General DiscussionsId be happy to coordinate and meet with you next week Thanks Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Friday September AM To Rainer Eva Subject General Discussions Eva I was talking to Jean the other day and she has advised me that you will be working in the Producer One group I would like to talk to you about some of the things you worked on this year as they relate to storage development etc Can you contact me early next week to get together for hour Thanks in advance BT
